questions.question: Both my sisters ………………………. married.
questions.description: Use a plural noun and a plural verb after both.

questions.description: Use each other to talk about two people or things use one another to talk about more than two people or things.

questions.question: Both Sam and Manual ……………………………. arrived.
questions.description: Use a plural verb after both.

questions.description: A pronoun used as the subject should be in its object form.

questions.question: None of us …………………………….. seen him since then.
questions.description: Use a singular verb after none.
